title: Fiora needs a rework
body:
Since people , or even riot, thinks that buffing her would be toxic because of her ultimate, that has little counterplay, I think she needs a rework.
Any competent player will play extremely defensive against fiora and, as soon as they buy ninja tabi, a HUGE part of her damage is lowered. At high elo, it is pretty hard to play as her, since people know how to counterbuild her early ( not even talking about counterpick, which she gets easily countered ).
However, buffing parts of her kit that does not involves her ult would be awesome. Maybe mana cost reduction or a ad ratio on her W ( passive and active ) would be pretty nice.
Also, don't use her win ratio as a source of " she is not bad, just look at her win ratio " .

replies.body:
Fiora is fine how she is, the only problem with her is that she is feast of famine so she either gets fed and carries or feeds and is useless. A good fiora player will be a problem whether someone grabs tabi or not. (By the way you are clearly not challenger judging by the placement games on the account you are posting on so why lie) Should her feast or famine style be changed? Probably yes so she isn't so broken when ahead by 1-2 kills or so she has a chance when she dies 1-2 times in lane.

Buffing her however in her current state is a horrible idea seeing as how she can already dive you level 6 if she is 1 kill ahead and snowball the game from there.

> [{quoted}](name=Dedrius,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=sLQ1TAeJ,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-03-18T17:48:53.461+0000)
>
> Fiora is fine how she is, the only problem with her is that she is feast of famine so she either gets fed and carries or feeds and is useless. A good fiora player will be a problem whether someone grabs tabi or not. (By the way you are clearly not challenger judging by the placement games on the account you are posting on so why lie) Should her feast or famine style be changed? Probably yes so she isn't so broken when ahead by 1-2 kills or so she has a chance when she dies 1-2 times in lane.
> 
> Buffing her however in her current state is a horrible idea seeing as how she can already dive you level 6 if she is 1 kill ahead and snowball the game from there.

http://www.lolking.net/summoner/br/8810134 
This is my main account. I used to play on north america servers, but the ping was way too high. This is my other account that I did not transfer to brazil.
Her feast and famine style is a problem, because if she pushes the lane, she can't kill her opponent, assuming she is not extremely feed.
Tabi denies a HUGE portion of her damage, doesn't matter if you are good or not. I think she needs better scaling than just a atk speed steroid, or her W that gives way less AD than zed, and the active is pretty meh
Change her e to armor pen. That could help

> [{quoted}](name=itachihatake,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=sLQ1TAeJ,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-03-17T20:50:34.946+0000)
>
> Change her e to armor pen. That could help

Yeah, maybe. Riot seems to be scared about buffing her when monster like Riven and Irelia exist

FiorA is easily on the same level as riven and Irelia. It depends on how you play her.

>
> FiorA is easily on the same level as riven and Irelia. It depends on how you play her.

No, she is not.
She doesn't get tankier with ad items like riven, has no CC , only two of her abilities scale with AD ( while all riven 4 scale , also her passive scale too), riven also has a dash-shield and defensive-offensive mobility. Fiora has only offensive mobility.
Irelia needs one damage item to shit in every squishy in the game, scales better, has cc, sustain, free tenacity

> She doesn't get tankier with ad items like riven, has no CC , only two of her abilities scale with AD ( while all riven 4 scale , also her passive scale too), riven also has a dash-shield and defensive-offensive mobility. Fiora has only offensive mobility.
> Irelia needs one damage item to shit in every squishy in the game, scales better, has cc, sustain, free tenacity

FiorA builds lifesteal while riven doesn't ( except hydra) riven is Tanky because she can't become untargetable. FiorA getting low? Ult. by the time you come out you'll have full health again. They're both the same, just go about things in a different way. Just like a fed riven is strong as hell, a fed fiorA can 1v5 as well.

> [{quoted}](name=itachihatake,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=sLQ1TAeJ,comment-id=00000000000000000000,timestamp=2015-03-18T16:53:34.166+0000)

They're both the same, just go about things in a different way. Just like a fed riven is strong as hell, a fed fiorA can 1v5 as well.

I don't know what game you are playing , but it is not league of legends.
Hydra gives 12% of lifesteal. If your ult does 1k of damage, you only get 120 of health back. ( your ult dealing 1k of damage is REALLY unrealistic).
A fed fiora can't 1v5, stop with this BS lol. Fiora builds hydra, so does riven, so "except hydra" just sounds like a stupid argument.
Riven is not "tankier" because she can't become untargetable. She is tankier because she is broken.
They are not close to be the same. Riven kit is way better than fiora's.
